tutorialNag.en: Please play the tutorial in "Play Demo Levels" before playing custom levels.
tutorialNag.ko: 커스텀 레벨을 플레이하기 전에 "데모 레벨 플레이"에서 튜토리얼을 플레이 해주세요.
tutorialNag.owo: Pwease pway the tutowiaw in "Pway demo levews" befowe pwaying custom levews.

optionsMenuDescription1.en: Multiplier to overall game speed. Chart will become faster or slower.
optionsMenuDescription1.ko: 전반적인 게임의 배속값입니다. 차트가 빠르거나 느려질 것입니다.
optionsMenuDescription1.owo: Multiplier to overall game speed. Chart will become faster or slower.

optionsMenuDescription2.en: Reduces intensity of game visual effects, or removes visual effects entirely.
optionsMenuDescription2.ko: 게임 시각 효과의 강도를 줄이거나, 시각 효과를 완전히 제거합니다.
optionsMenuDescription2.owo: Reduces intensity of game visual effects, or removes visual effects entirely.

optionsMenuDescription3.en: Makes tap notes more lenient, or allows you to hit tap notes automatically.
optionsMenuDescription3.ko: 탭 노트 판정을 더 관대하게 만들거나, 탭 노트를 자동으로 처리하도록 합니다.
optionsMenuDescription3.owo: Makes tap notes more lenient, or allows you to hit tap notes automatically.

optionsMenuDescription4.en: Makes side notes more lenient, or allows you to hit side notes automatically.
optionsMenuDescription4.ko: 사이드 노트 판정을 더 관대하게 만들거나, 사이드 노트를 자동으로 처리하도록 합니다.
optionsMenuDescription4.owo: Makes side notes more lenient, or allows you to hit side notes automatically.

optionsMenuDescription5.en: Automatically restarts the level upon missing or hitting a barely.
optionsMenuDescription5.ko: 놓침이나 부정확 판정이 나왔을 때 레벨을 자동으로 다시 시작합니다.
optionsMenuDescription5.owo: Automatically restarts the level upon missing or hitting a barely.

optionsMenuDescription6.en: Removes the ability to obtain Barely judgements, causing a Miss in their place instead.
optionsMenuDescription6.ko: 부정확 판정을 제거하여 놓침 판정이 대신 나오게 합니다.
optionsMenuDescription6.owo: Removes the ability to obtain Barely judgements, causing a Miss in their place instead.

editorWarning.en:
Hello, thanks for checking out the level editor!
While its usable to create levels, it is currently not very user friendly, and is prone to glitches. We plan to smooth it out over the course of development. Please consider the level editor in its current state experimental.
That being said, have fun, and make sure to save often!

(Press enter to go to editor, or escape to quit)
editorWarning.ko:
안녕하세요, 레벨 에디터를 봐주셔서 고마워요!
레벨을 만들기에는 충분하지만, 지금은 사용자 편의성이 부족하고 여러 문제가 자주 생길 수 있어요. 개발을 거치면서 다듬을 계획이에요. 현재 레벨 에디터가 실험 단계라는 것을 고려해 주세요.
설명은 충분히 했으니 재밌게 즐기시고, 자주 저장하는 것을 잊지 마세요!

(enter를 눌러 에디터로 들어가거나, escape를 눌러 나가기)
editorWarning.owo:
hewwo, thanks fow checking ouwt the wevew editow! OwO
whiwe its uwsabwe to cweate wevews, it is cuwwwentwy not vewy uwsew fwiendwy, and is pwone to gwitches. We pwan to smooth it ouwt ovew the couwwse of devewopment. Pwease considew the wevew editow in its cuwwwent state expewimentaw.
 that being said, have fuwn, and make suwwe to save often! OwO

(pwess entew to go to editow, ow escape to quwit)

tutorial_1.en:
So you want to block beats?
It's going to take an awful lot of practice.
tutorial_1.ko:
그래서 비트를 막고 싶다고요?
고된 연습이 필요할 거에요.
tutorial_1.owo:
so u want to bwock beats? UwU
it's going to take an awfuww wot of pwactice.

tutorial_2_mouse.en:
Let's start with the basics.
For Blocks and Holds, simply move your paddle with the mouse to hit them.
tutorial_2_mouse.ko:
기본부터 시작하자고요.
블록과 홀드는, 그냥 마우스로 패들을 움직여서 맞추면 돼요.
tutorial_2_mouse.owo:
let's stawt with the basics.
 fow bwocks and howds, simpwy move uw paddwe with the mouwse to hit them.

tutorial_2_controller.en:
Let's start with the basics.
For Blocks and Holds, simply move your paddle with the analog stick to hit them.
tutorial_2_controller.ko:
기본부터 시작하자고요.
블록과 홀드는, 그냥 조이스틱으로 패들을 움직여서 맞추면 돼요.
tutorial_2_controller.owo:
let's stawt with the basics.
 fow bwocks and howds, simpwy move uw paddwe with the anawog stick to hit them.

tutorial_4.en: Not bad, but let's face it, that was easy.
tutorial_4.ko: 나쁘진 않지만, 솔직히 이건 너무 쉬웠어요.
tutorial_4.owo: Not bad, buwt wet's face it, that was easy.

tutorial_5.en:
Time for Taps.
They can show up either on their own, or attatched to other notes.
tutorial_5.ko:
탭에 대해 알아볼 차례에요.
탭은 따로 나올 수도 있고, 다른 노트에 붙어서 나올 수도 있어요.
tutorial_5.owo:
time fow taps.
 they can show uwp eithew on theiw own, ow attatched to othew notes.

tutorial_6_mouse.en:
To hit them, press Z or X when they reach your paddle.
You can also click with the mouse.
tutorial_6_mouse.owo:
to hit them, pwess z ow x when they weach uw paddwe.
 youw can awso cwick with the mouwse.

tutorial_6_controller.en: To hit them, press (A) or (X) when they reach your paddle.
tutorial_6_controller.owo: To hit them, pwess (a) ow (x) when they weach uw paddwe.

tutorial_7.en: Why don't we take this to the next level?
tutorial_7.owo: Why don't we take this to the next wevew? OwO

tutorial_8.en: I have to concede, that was impressive! Next are Mines and Sides.
tutorial_8.owo: I have to concede, that was impwessive! OwO next awe mines and sides.

tutorial_9.en:
Mines just need to be avoided,
and Sides need to be slammed into from the side.
tutorial_9.owo:
mines juwst need to be avoided,
and sides need to be swammed into fwom the side.

tutorial_10.en:
For Sides, timing is key.
Don't fall apart now!
tutorial_10.owo:
fow sides, timing is key.
 don't faww apawt now!

inverses_2.en: hit these with the back of your paddle instead of the front!
inverses_2.owo: hit these with the back of uw paddwe instead of the fwont! OwO

calibration_1_mouse.owo: Pwess z to the beat. OwO

crashBody.en:
Beatblock crashed unexpectedly!
Would you like to save a crash report? 
This will create a text file that can then be sent to the developers.

epilepsyWarning.en: Beatblock has some visuals that may trigger epilepsy or photosensitivity issues for players. Proceed with caution, and please check the accessibility options for settings to remove visual effects if needed.
epilepsyWarning.ko: 비트블록은 플레이어에게 발작이나 광과민성 문제를 일으킬 수 있는 시각적 요소가 있습니다. 주의를 기울이시고, 필요한 경우 시각 효과를 제거할 수 있는 접근성 설정을 확인하세요.
epilepsyWarning.owo: Beatblock has some visuals that may trigger epilepsy or photosensitivity issues for players. Proceed with caution, and please check the accessibility options for settings to remove visual effects if needed.

demoWarning.en:
This game is currently still in a demo phase, and acts as a preview of a small section of the experience. The difficulty curve is not representative of the full game's planned scope & difficulty, and anything in this demo is subject to change between now and release.
Thank you for your understanding!
demoWarning.ko:
이 게임은 현재 베타 단계이며, 전체 경험의 일부 미리보기로서 작용합니다. 난이도 설정값은 전체 게임의 계획된 초점 및 난이도를 나타내지 않으며, 이 데모의 요소는 현재 그리고 출시 때 변경될 수 있습니다.
양해해 주셔서 감사합니다!
demoWarning.owo:
This game is currently still in a demo phase, and acts as a preview of a small section of the experience. The difficulty curve is not representative of the full game's planned scope & difficulty, and anything in this demo is subject to change between now and release.
Thank you for your understanding!
